description:
Great location in Greenpoint, situated between McCarren and McGolrick Parks. Numerous bars, coffee shops and restaurants nearby. Close to Nassau G line stop and to the Bedford, Metropolitan and Graham L stops.

You’ll love my place because of the neighborhood. Great mix of established families and creative types. 

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Full access to kitchen, bathroom and living room. WiFi.

Bed sizes are both full/double. Towels, pillows and sheets will be provided.

Full access to kitchen, bathroom and living room. WiFi.

I will be available to help you settle in and check out. Minimal interaction with permanent host.

Nassau "G" stop is less than a five minute walk. Graham, Lorimer & Bedford "L" stops are less than 15 minutes by foot.
name: Charming Greenpoint Apartment
review: The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
